mapper.select: select m.member_id, member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_file_system_name, member_type, member_drive_register_date, member_point, apply_id, apply_course, apply_location, apply_date, apply_register_date, starter_member_id, veteran_member_id, apply_status from tbl_member m join tbl_apply a on m.member = a.starter_member_id
